893:2: ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ ugracaṇḍaṃ cacakitacakitaṃ caṃcarā(lā)
893:4: hū hū hūṃkārarūpaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ khaṅgapāśān dharantam|
893:5: daṃ daṃ daṃ daṇḍapāṇiṃ ḍamaruḍimiḍimāṃ ḍaṇḍamānaṃ bhramantaṃ
893:6: bhraṃ bhraṃ bhraṃ bhrāntanetraṃ jayatu vijayate siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 1||
893:7: ghraṃ ghraṃ ghraṃ ghorarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghargharīnādaghoṣaṃ
893:8: huṃ huṃ huṃ hāsyarūpaṃ tribhuvanadharitaṃ khecaraṃ kṣetrapālam|
893:9: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhūtanāthaṃ sakalajanahitaṃ tasya dehā (?) piśācaṃ
893:10: hū hū hūṃkāranādaiḥ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 2||
893:11: vraṃ vraṃ vraṃ vyomaghoraṃ bhramati bhuvanataḥ saptapātālatālaṃ
893:12: kraṃ kraṃ kraṃ kāmarūpaṃ dhadhakitadhakitaṃ tasya haste triśūlam|
893:13: druṃ druṃ druṃ durgarūpaṃ bhramati ca caritaṃ tasya dehasvarūpaṃ
893:14: maṃ maṃ maṃ mantrasiddhaṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 3||
893:15: jhaṃ jhaṃ jhaṃkārarūpaṃ jhamati jhamajhamā jhaṃjhamānā samantāt
893:16: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃkāladhārī dhudhuritadhuritaṃ dhundhumārī kumārī|
893:17: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāstriśūlaṃ
893:18: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 4||
893:19: raṃ raṃ raṃ rāyarudraṃ rurudhitarudhitaṃ dīrghajihvākarālaṃ
893:20: paṃ paṃ paṃ pretarūpaṃ samayavijayinaṃ sumbhadambhe nisumbhe|
893:22: hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃkāranāde bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 5||
893:25: paṅke jātābhijāte curu curu curute kāminī kāṇḍakaṇṭhe
893:26: kaṅkālī kālarātrī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 6||
893:28: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kālarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghuṃ ghumā bindurūpī|
893:29: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāśatriśūlaṃ
893:30: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 7||
893:31: jhrīṃ jhrīṃ jhrīṃkāravṛnde pracaritamahasā vāmahaste kapālaṃ
893:32: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgahaste ḍamaruḍimaḍimāṃ muṇḍamālāsuśobhām|
893:33: ruṃ ruṃ ruṃ rudramālābharaṇavibhūṣitā dirghajihvā karālā
893:34: devi śrī ugracaṇḍī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste|| 8||
